attributes.additional_details: I would like the parliament to change it because too many times I see students with bags under there eyes and dragging there feet along. This can really change our education because we can have time to wake up and pay more attention In lessons.If you are nearing GCSEs this can really change your results just because of a single hour each day.
attributes.background: I want the government to take action and change the school hours to five hours long instead of 6.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612366
